review: Visiting Dr. Nath for the last 16 years and I don't think of visiting anyone else. I recommend his name to my family members and friends

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Siddhartha treated me for wisdom teeth extraction.I would highly recommend him for his professionalism.He answered all my queries regarding the problem. Suggested the solution correctly.During my extraction I did not feel any problem.It was very smooth and perfect.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Siddhartha Nath has a strong set of diagnostic ****** and clinical accumen.
In west bengal, you would hardly find any other doctor who is so polite and gentle in explaining your queries.
Apart from that, his treatment protocol is much more advanced and evidence based than most of his peers.
Regards,
Dr.Bedarshi Banerjee, MBBS,MD(path)
Asst. Prof.
Dept. Of Pathology,
KPC Medical college and hospital.

review: Great doctor. Gives perfect explanation for the problem, treatment, after effects and any other doubt if persists. Definitely not a money monger. I had a badly done root canal and though he too could have taken advantage of my pathetic situation, he didn't. An excellent doctor for sure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of the services provided by Dr.  Siddhartha Nath is tooth extraction as mentioned in this App. But most surprisingly Dr.  Nath confirmed that he doesn't extract tooth!!! It is wastage of my time and money.  * ***** **** ******* ******* ****** ****** ******* ** *** *****
reply_text: It is services provided by Dental Health Clinic as stated in the app. Dr Dipyaman Sen does the extractions. Also before consulting the Dr patient should have asked at the reception whether extraction is possible at that time. Also no walk in work is done. All work is by appointment so that a proper disinfecting protocol is maintained.
